select g.id, g.name, g.img, g.price, g.discount, g.type, g.busines_id as busines_id,
g.goods_number, g.unit_price, g.specification,
case g.readyFlag when '0' then '是' else '否' end as readyFlag, case g.returnsFlag when '0' then '是' else '否' end as returnsFlag, case g.flag when '0' then '是' else '否' end as flag,
